title: Antonio Scaduto
text:
Antonio Scaduto (born December 1, 1977) is an Italian <a href="canoe%20racing">sprint canoer</a> who has competed since the early 2000s. Competing in two <a href="Summer%20Olympics">Summer Olympics</a>, he won a bronze medal in the K-2 1000 m event at <a href="Beijing">Beijing</a> in <a href="2008%20Summer%20Olympics">2008</a>.
Scaduto also won a bronze medal in the K-4 500 m event at the <a href="2005%20ICF%20Canoe%20Sprint%20World%20Championships">2005 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships</a> in <a href="Zagreb">Zagreb</a>.
